document.title: SoNaR: STEVIN Nederlandstalig Referentiecorpus - Nieuwe Media Corpu...
document.intro: The SoNaR New Media Corpus 1.0 consists of the text categories WR-P-E-L_tweets, WR-U-E-A_chats, WR-U-E-D_sms and contains over 35 million words. Those texts were collected within the STEVIN project SoNaR. All texts were tokenised, POS-tagged and lemmatised.

access.title: available for non-commercial organisations; user licence required;

properties.intro: The SoNaR New Media Corpus 1.0 consists of the text categories WR-P-E-L_tweets, WR-U-E-A_chats, WR-U-E-D_sms and contains over 35 million words. Those texts were collected within the STEVIN project SoNaR. All texts were tokenised, POS-tagged and lemmatised.
